Summary Note:
The RM was introduced to Lehmann Roth Kägi at a corporate retreat in Zürich. They participated in team-building activities and developed a strong rapport, which eventually led to a successful business partnership.
Lehmann Roth Kägi is a 43 year old Shipping Company Owner from Switzerland. He has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
Seeking a trusted partner for wealth management, he joined Julius Baer for its comprehensive and tailored services.
Family Background: Lehmann Roth Kägi is currently single. He does not have any children.
Education Background:
Lehmann obtained his secondary school diploma from Wirtschaftsgymnasium Olten Solothurn in 1999.
Lehmann pursued higher education at Hotel Institute Montreux, graduating in 2005.
Occupation History:
Lehmann Roth Kägi is a 43 year old Shipping Company Owner from Switzerland.
Lehmann Roth Kägi's first role was as a Ship Broker at Maersk Line (Switzerland) A/S, where he worked diligently from 2006 to 2009 to establish a strong reputation.
At Maersk Line (Switzerland) A/S, he held the position of Shipping Company Owner from 2011 till now, making significant contributions to the organization.
Wealth Summary:
Throughout his career, he saved 310000 CHF, investing in various assets to grow his wealth.
He owns villa in Frauenfeld, where he resides. It is worth 5390000 CHF.

In addition to his primary residence, he owns house in Wil worth 3110000 CHF.

He inherited a significant sum of 2210000 CHF from his grandmother, a respected Hedge Fund Manager, in 2013, which he has wisely invested.
Client Summary: In summary, Lehmann has demonstrated a strong work ethic and financial acumen, positioning them well for the future.
